title: I have purchased a Pixel 3. I want to create contacts with addresses etc. in one place with google so that I can share them with Google Maps, My phone etc. My google contacts on PC doesn't have the fields I need. I want to key the information into my laptop and transfer it to my phone etc. Any solution on Google? A contacts app? Thanks
content: I have tried to enter contacts in Google from my laptop with intent to transfer the data to my pixel 3 and use it on both on google maps.  Not enough feels in my Google account.
